SEARCH
Module LabAssignment
Package entity

Class Report

java.lang.Object
entity.Report
public class Report extends Object
Represents a statistical report generated by Career Center Staff. This entity aggregates internship data to provide insights into the system's status (e.g., number of pending, approved, or filled positions).

  • Constructor Details

    • Report

      public Report(String reportID, CareerCenterStaff generatedBy, LocalDate generationDate, List<Internship> includedOpportunities)
      Constructs a new Report.
      Parameters:
      reportID - The unique identifier for the report.
      generatedBy - The staff member who generated the report.
      generationDate - The date the report was created.
      includedOpportunities - The list of internships included in the analysis.

  • Method Details

    • getReportID

      public String getReportID()
      Gets the unique report ID.
      Returns:
      The report ID string.

    • getGeneratedBy

      public CareerCenterStaff getGeneratedBy()
      Gets the staff member who generated this report.
      Returns:
      The CareerCenterStaff object.

    • getGenerationDate

      public LocalDate getGenerationDate()
      Gets the date this report was generated.
      Returns:
      The generation date.

    • getIncludedOpportunities

      public List<Internship> getIncludedOpportunities()
      Retrieves the list of internships included in this report.
      Returns:
      A new list containing the internship objects (defensive copy).

    • displaySummary

      public void displaySummary()
      Prints a textual summary of the report to the console. Includes metadata (ID, Author) and a breakdown of internship statuses.

    • getStatistics

      public Map<String,Object> getStatistics()
      Computes detailed statistics for the included internships. Calculates counts for each status (PENDING, APPROVED, REJECTED, FILLED) and their respective percentages.
      Returns:
      A map containing statistical keys (Strings) and values (Integers for counts, Doubles for percentages).

    • exportToFile

      public boolean exportToFile(String filePath)
      Exports the full report and statistics to a text file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The file system path where the report should be saved.
      Returns:
      true if the file was written successfully; false if an I/O error occurred.
